def getParquetDataFrame(filePath):
    df = spark.read.option("header", True).parquet(filePath)
    return df

def writeParquetFile(df, mode, filePath):
    df.write.mode(mode).parquet(filePath)

def getFilePath(relativepath,filename):
    account_name = "groupeocde"
    container_name = "ocde"
    adlspath = "abfss://%s@%s.dfs.core.windows.net/%s"%(container_name, account_name, relativepath)
    adlspath = adlspath + filename
    return adlspath

#depensesante OK
depensesante_df = oecd.data(
    resource_id="SHA", 
    key="HFTOT.HCTOT.HPTOT.PARPIB.AUS+AUT+BEL+CAN+CHL+COL+CRI+CZE+DNK+EST+FIN+FRA+DEU+GRC+HUN+ISL+IRL+ISR+ITA+JPN+KOR+LVA+LTU+LUX+MEX+NLD+NZL+NOR+POL+PRT+SVK+SVN+ESP+SWE+CHE+TUR+GBR+USA+NMEC+ALB+ARG+BRA+BGR+CHN+HRV+CYP+IND+MLT+MNE+MKD+PER+ROU+SRB+ZAF/all?startTime=1999&endTime=2021"
    ).to_pandas()

depensesante = pd.DataFrame(depensesante_df).reset_index()
depensesantespark = spark.createDataFrame(depensesante)
writeParquetFile(depensesantespark,"overwrite",getFilePath("bronze","/depensesante"))
testdepensesante = getParquetDataFrame(getFilePath("bronze","/depensesante"))

#population OK : 4 valeurs de AGE Ã  mettre en colonnes
population_df = oecd.data(
    resource_id="HISTPOP", 
    key="AUS+AUT+BEL+CAN+CHL+COL+CRI+CZE+DNK+EST+FIN+FRA+DEU+GRC+HUN+ISL+IRL+ISR+ITA+JPN+KOR+LVA+LTU+LUX+MEX+NLD+NZL+NOR+POL+PRT+SVK+SVN+ESP+SWE+CHE+TUR+GBR+USA+EU27+G20+OECD+WLD+NMEC+ARG+BRA+BGR+CHN+HRV+CYP+IND+IDN+MLT+ROU+RUS+SAU+SGP+ZAF.T.TOTAL+LESS_15_SHARE+15-64_SHARE+65_OVER_SHARE/all?startTime=1999&endTime=2021"
    ).to_pandas()

population = pd.DataFrame(population_df).reset_index()
populationspark = spark.createDataFrame(population)
writeParquetFile(populationspark,"overwrite",getFilePath("bronze","/population"))
testpopulation = getParquetDataFrame(getFilePath("bronze","/population"))

#pib OK : Supprimer TRANSACT et MEASURE : Value = Milliers DOLLARDS 
pib_df = oecd.data(
    resource_id="SNA_TABLE1", 
    key="AUS+AUT+BEL+CAN+CHL+COL+CRI+CZE+DNK+EST+FIN+FRA+DEU+GRC+HUN+ISL+IRL+ISR+ITA+JPN+KOR+LVA+LTU+LUX+MEX+NLD+NZL+NOR+POL+PRT+SVK+SVN+ESP+SWE+CHE+TUR+GBR+USA+EA19+EU27_2020+OECD+NMEC+ARG+BRA+BGR+CHN+HRV+CYP+IND+IDN+MLT+ROU+RUS+SAU+ZAF.B1_GE.CPC/all?startTime=2016&endTime=2022"
    ).to_pandas()

pib = pd.DataFrame(pib_df).reset_index()
pibspark = spark.createDataFrame(pib)
writeParquetFile(pibspark,"overwrite",getFilePath("bronze","/pib"))
testpib = getParquetDataFrame(getFilePath("bronze","/pib"))

#couverture sociale OK : Filtrer sur TOTPOPTX et Pays
couverturesociale_df = oecd.data(
    resource_id="HEALTH_PROT", 
    key="HCVG+TPRI+TPRIBASI+COVG+COVGCMED+PHIN+PHINTPHI+PHINPMPI+PHINDUPI+PHINCMPI+PHINSUPI.COVPOPTX+EFFPEREF+TOTPOPTX.AUS+AUT+BEL+CAN+CHL+COL+CRI+CZE+DNK+EST+FIN+FRA+DEU+GRC+HUN+ISL+IRL+ISR+ITA+JPN+KOR+LVA+LTU+LUX+MEX+NLD+NZL+NOR+POL+PRT+SVK+SVN+ESP+SWE+CHE+TUR+GBR+USA+NMEC+BRA+RUS+ZAF/all?startTime=2010&endTime=2021"
    ).to_pandas()

couverturesociale = pd.DataFrame(couverturesociale_df).reset_index()
couverturesocialespark = spark.createDataFrame(couverturesociale)
writeParquetFile(couverturesocialespark,"overwrite",getFilePath("bronze","/couverturesociale"))
testcouverturesociale = getParquetDataFrame(getFilePath("bronze","/couverturesociale"))

#depensessociales OK : %PIB : supprimer SOURCE|BRANCH|TYPEXP|TYPROG|   UNIT
depensessociales_df = oecd.data(
    resource_id="SOCX_AGG", 
    key="50.90.0.0.PCT_GDP.AUS+AUT+BEL+CAN+CHL+CZE+DNK+EST+FIN+FRA+DEU+GRC+HUN+ISL+IRL+ISR+ITA+JPN+KOR+LVA+LUX+MEX+NLD+NZL+NOR+POL+PRT+SVK+SVN+ESP+SWE+TUR+GBR+USA+OECD/all?startTime=1999&endTime=2021"
    ).to_pandas()

depensessociales = pd.DataFrame(depensessociales_df).reset_index()
depensessocialesspark = spark.createDataFrame(depensessociales)
writeParquetFile(depensessocialesspark,"overwrite",getFilePath("bronze","/depensessociales"))
testdepensessociales = getParquetDataFrame(getFilePath("bronze","/depensessociales"))

#cotisationsecu OK
cotisationsecu_df = oecd.data(
    resource_id="REV", 
    key="SUPRA+FED+STATE+LOCAL+SOCSEC+NES._SPLIT+TOTALTAX_GROSS+TOTALTAX_NET.TAXUSD+TAXGDP.AUS+AUT+BEL+CAN+CHL+COL+CRI+CZE+DNK+EST+FIN+FRA+DEU+GRC+HUN+ISL+IRL+ISR+ITA+JPN+KOR+LVA+LTU+LUX+MEX+NLD+NZL+NOR+POL+PRT+SVK+SVN+ESP+SWE+CHE+TUR+GBR+USA/all?startTime=2000&endTime=2021"
    ).to_pandas()

cotisationsecu = pd.DataFrame(cotisationsecu_df).reset_index()
cotisationsecuspark = spark.createDataFrame(cotisationsecu)
writeParquetFile(cotisationsecuspark,"overwrite",getFilePath("bronze","/cotisationsecu"))
testcotisationsecu = getParquetDataFrame(getFilePath("bronze","/cotisationsecu"))
